name: Barbarian Onslaught: The Secret of Steel
name_original: Barbarian Onslaught: The Secret of Steel
description:
A young barbarian sets out on a quest to find the legendary Secret of Steel...

This sequel took nearly a year(!) to finish and contains many enemies, 19 levels, boss fights, complex combat and physics engines, geographical puzzle solving, an epic musical score and an intriguing storyline. It features a brutal one-button combat system, like its predecessor Barbarian Onslaught. Crows follow the Barbarian around, swoop down and feast on slain enemies.

A sequel to Barbarian Onslaught: The Secret of Steel has been on the drawing board for a long time. It will stay frozen while we work on Superfighters Deluxe, however. Barbarian Odyssey will contain lots of sword-and-sorcery goodness, old-school platforming and exploration, huge monsters and some Lovecraftian horror stuff.

This a 11-year old Flash game!! The old Newgrounds version still playable, but you may have to download the Newgrounds Flash Player.
